message.original: 謁見の間に集まった主要人物らと話し 覚者としての立場と使命を理解する
message.translation: Talk to the important people in the Audience Chamber Learn about your position and mission as an Arisen

message.original: 謁見の間へ向かいレオと話す
message.translation: Head to Audience Chamber and speak with Leo

message.original: レオとミシアルに話す
